benefits.heading: Why plan your new-build with MyHome24App?
benefits.lead: New construction involves many decisions: plot, developer, financing and finishes. We help you stay on top of everything and avoid unpleasant surprises.

items.title: Everything in one place
items.text: Listings, guidance and financing hints in a single platform – no endless searching required.

items.title: Transparent information
items.text: Clear explanations on energy efficiency, build quality, legal framework and available subsidies.

items.title: Planning that fits your needs
items.text: Whether single-family home, semi-detached or multi-unit building – we show realistic paths for your budget.

items.title: Support with open questions
items.text: You are not alone: orientation for documents, bank meetings and offers from developers.

features.heading: Key advantages of new-build homes
features.lead: New construction offers modern architecture, energy efficiency and long-term warranties – ideal for buyers who want a low-maintenance and future-proof property.

items.title: Energy efficiency
items.text: Modern insulation, solar technology and lower running costs make new-builds especially attractive.

items.title: Individual design
items.text: Flexible floor plans, smart living concepts and the option to influence many decisions yourself.

items.title: Legal certainty
items.text: First-time occupancy with builder’s warranty, up-to-date building regulations and clearly defined defect liability periods.

items.title: Direct contact
items.text: Communication directly with the developer or seller – without hidden brokerage fees.

reasons.title: Why new-build with MyHome24App?
reasons.intro: With new-build properties you invest in modern standards, safe technology and predictable costs. Our platform supports you with selection and orientation.

items.title: Energy efficiency & sustainability
items.text: Modern insulation, efficient heating systems and often renewable energy sources reduce running costs and protect the climate.

items.title: Predictable maintenance
items.text: Everything is new: you benefit from manufacturer warranties and usually do not need major renovations in the first years.

items.title: Contemporary layouts
items.text: Open-plan living, home office options and low-barrier access – new projects are designed for modern lifestyles.

items.title: Legal certainty & transparency
items.text: Clear contracts, building specifications and formal handover processes give you security when buying a new-build.

steps.heading: How we guide you through the process
steps.title: Your path to the right new-build project
steps.intro: Step by step from first orientation to handover of the keys.
steps.lead: A new-build project is a journey with several stages. MyHome24App helps you tackle each step in a structured way.

items.title: 1. Initial orientation & budget
items.text: Get an overview of typical purchase prices, additional costs and potential subsidy options.

items.title: 2. Compare projects & developers
items.text: See suitable new-build projects and compare location, specifications and construction concepts.

items.title: 3. Check financing & subsidies
items.text: Clarify feasibility, KfW funding and interest-rate models together with your bank or advisor.

items.title: 4. Contracts & construction phase
items.text: Go into contract talks, construction schedules and handovers better informed and prepared.

tip.heading: Tip: make use of KfW funding
tip.title: Tip: Check KfW funding & subsidies
tip.text: Many new-build projects are eligible for subsidised loans or grants for energy-efficient buildings. Check early on which programmes might apply to your project.
tip.note: Note: This is not financial advice. Please seek individual advice from your bank or an independent financial advisor.

contactCta.title: Questions about your new-build project?
contactCta.text: Are you currently planning a new-build or thinking about your next step? Use our contact form to briefly describe your plans – we’ll help you with orientation.
